name: Coconut Rum Brazilian Lemonade

name: Iced Peach Tea Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '5 1/2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '1 1/2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': None, 'name': 'peaches - peeled, pitted, and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': None, 'name': 'each-flavored tea bags'}
steps: Stir together 1 1/2 cups water, sugar, and sliced peaches in a large pot. Bring to a simmer, and simmer until sugar is dissolved, the mixture is syrupy, and syrup is infused with peach flavor, about 10 minutes. Set syrup aside to cool, then strain off peaches; reserve peaches for another use.. Meanwhile, in another pot bring remaining 4 cups water to a boil. Turn heat off. Add tea bags; steep 4 to 6 minutes. Remove tea bags and discard.. Add lemon juice to syrup. To each glass add ice and 6 ounces brewed tea. Sweeten each glass to taste with 1 to 2 ounces lemon-peach syrup.

name: Old-Fashioned Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, or more as needed'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Juice lemons; you should have 1 cup juice.. Combine juice, sugar, and water in a 1/2-gallon pitcher. Stir until sugar dissolves. Taste and add more water if desired.. Chill and serve over ice.

name: Hard Cranberry Limeade
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'cranberry vodka (such as Deep Eddy)'}, {'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'lime vodka'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'ice, as needed'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'Sprite'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lime slice, for garnish'}
steps: Combine cranberry vodka and lime vodka in a tall glass. Add ice, top off with Sprite, and stir. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Brazilian Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Wash limes thoroughly. Cut off the ends and slice into eight wedges.. Place limes in a blender with water, sugar, sweetened condensed milk, and ice; pulse 5 times, or until smooth. Strain through a fine mesh strainer to remove rinds. Serve over ice.

name: State Fair Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}
steps: Wash lemons and peel off all the zest using a vegetable peeler; set peeled lemons aside. Add lemon zest to a bowl and cover with sugar; toss to combine. Cover and let sit for a minimum of 2 hours, or up to overnight.. Bring water to a boil in a pot over high heat; turn off heat and pour in lemon-sugar mixture. Stir and let sit until sugar is completely dissolved, about 5 minutes.. Pour through a mesh strainer back into the same bowl and discard the zest. Let cool to room temperature, 20 to 30 minutes.. Cut lemons in half and squeeze juice into the bowl. Pour lemonade into a serving pitcher; cover and chill thoroughly before serving over ice, at least 2 hours.

name: All Natural Strawberry Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'strawberries, halved'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Place strawberries in a blender; top with 2 tablespoons sugar. Pour 1 cup water over sugared strawberries; blend until completely smooth.. Transfer strawberry juice into a large pitcher; stir in remaining 6 cups water, lemon juice, and 1 cup sugar until well blended. Chill before serving.

name: Refreshing Cucumber Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cucumber, sliced'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, juiced'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Make the simple syrup: Combine water and sugar together in a saucepan over medium heat; heat until just about to boil and sugar has dissolved. Place in refrigerator until cool, about 30 minutes.. Blend cucumber in a blender or food processor until mashed into a pulp. Pour cucumber pulp into a fine mesh strainer placed over a bowl; allow to sit until you have about 2/3 cup of cucumber juice in the bowl, about 15 minutes.. Stir simple syrup, cucumber juice, and lemon juice together in a pitcher. Serve cold.

name: Watermelon Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed watermelon'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Place watermelon into a blender; cover and puree until smooth. Strain through a fine mesh sieve.. Bring sugar and 1/2 cup water to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat until sugar dissolves, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in 3 cups of cold water and lemon juice.. Divide ice into 12 glasses; scoop 2 to 3 tablespoons of watermelon puree over ice, then top with lemonade. Gently stir before serving.

name: Orangeade
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'freshly squeezed orange juice'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}
steps: Bring 2 cups water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan; cook at a boil for 3 minutes, stirring to dissolve sugar, and creating a simple syrup.. Combine simple syrup, 6 cups water, orange juice, and lemon juice in a large pitcher; refrigerate until cold.

name: Vintage Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'water'}
steps: Peel the rinds from the 5 lemons and cut them into 1/2 inch slices. Set the lemons aside.. Place the rinds in a bowl and sprinkle the sugar over them. Let this stand for about one hour, so that the sugar begins to soak up the oils from the lemons.. Bring water to a boil in a covered saucepan and then pour the hot water over the sugared lemon rinds. Allow this mixture to cool for 20 minutes and then remove the rinds.. Squeeze the lemons into another bowl. Pour the juice through a strainer into the sugar mixture. Stir well, pour into pitcher and pop it in the fridge! Serve with ice cubes.

name: Ginger Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '14', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'fresh ginger root'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lemons, sliced, for garnish'}
steps: Combine sugar, water, and ginger root in an 8-quart saucepan. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally until sugar melts. Remove from heat.. Stir in lemon juice. Cool 15 minutes. Remove ginger. Refrigerate lemonade at least 1 hour, or until chilled.. Serve over ice, and garnish with lemon slices.

name: Tito's Berry Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': "Tito's Handmade Vodka"}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'lemonade'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Fresh berries, sliced or whole'}
steps: Lightly muddle berries into a glass. Add Tito's Handmade Vodka, lemonade, and ice.. Stir and garnish with a strawberry or lemon slice.

steps: In a 2 quart pitcher, combine the lemon juice, water and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Chill in refrigerator.

steps: Heat 3/4 cup sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until sugar has dissolved, about 2 minutes. Let cool.. Place blackberries and remaining 2 tablespoons of sugar in a blender. Blend until smooth.. Combine simple syrup, blended blackberries, remaining 4 cups of water, and lemon juice. Place a fine-mesh sieve over a pitcher and pour lemonade into the pitcher; discard solids. Serve over ice.

steps: In a large pan, combine water and sugar. Heat until the sugar just melts. Remove from heat and pour in lemon juice. Mix well and chill in refrigerator before serving. Garnish with lemon, lime or orange slices.

Pour 7 cups water into mixture, stir to combine, and serve garnished with crushed mint leaves.

Remove the saucepan from heat and cool simple syrup to room temperature.. Stir together remaining 6 cups water, ice, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a pitcher until well combined. Stir in sweetened strawberries.

name: Chia Fresca

steps: Combine rhubarb, sugar, and lemon peel in a large saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until sugar has dissolved and rhubarb releases its juice and starts to break up, about 10 minutes. Off heat, stir in lemon juice.. Pour rhubarb mixture through a fine-mesh sieve, pressing out as much liquid as possible.. Fill a glass with ice; add 1 cup water and 1/3 cup syrup. Stir to combine.

name: Citrus Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, juiced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, juiced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges, juiced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, sliced into rounds'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}

name: Pineapple Lemonade

steps: Core pineapple using a pineapple corer or slicer. Cut into chunks and measure out 2 cups. Reserve any pineapple juice.. Combine 2 cups pineapple chunks, reserved pineapple juice, 2 cups water, and lemon juice in a blender. Blend until smooth and pour into a pitcher.. Add remaining 2 cups water and sweetener to the pitcher. Stir and serve over ice.

name: Southern-Style Vanilla Lemonade

steps: Cut the lemons in half and scoop the pulp into a blender. Add half of the rinds along with sugar, vanilla extract, and 2 cups of water. Blend until smooth, then strain into a serving pitcher and stir in the remaining water.

name: Hot Pink Lemonade

steps: Boil one cup of water with the sugar in a saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring until the liquid becomes clear. Remove from heat and stir in the lemon juice. Pour 7 cups of cool water and ice into a serving pitcher. Add the lemon syrup and blueberries; stir until you get a 'hot pink' color.

name: Peppermint Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh lemon'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}
steps: Pour the lemonade concentrate into a large pitcher or cooler with a spout. Stir in enough water to make 1 gallon. Grate the zest from the lemon and add to the pitcher, then squeeze the lemon juice from the lemon into the pitcher. In a small bowl, crush the mint leaves into the sugar using a muddler or a wooden spoon. Stir into the lemonade. Cover and chill for several hours, then strain to remove the leaves and zest before serving. Serve over ice and garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Bethy's Cucumber Basil Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cucumber, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves, torn'}
steps: Combine 1 cup water and sugar together in a small saucepan; bring to a boil. Cook and stir until sugar is dissolved, about 5 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and cool syrup to room temperature.. Stir syrup, remaining water, lemon juice, cucumber, and basil together in a pitcher; chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.

name: Basil Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'firmly packed torn basil leaves'}
steps: Stir water, lemonade, sugar, and lime juice together in a pitcher. Add 1/2 cup basil leaves, stir to combine, cover the pitcher, and refrigerate until flavors combine, 8 hours to overnight. Remove basil leaves and discard.

name: Amy's Lavender Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tray', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried lavender'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'boiling water'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water, or as needed'}
steps: Place ice cubes into a 2 quart pitcher. Place the lavender into a bowl, and pour boiling water over it. Allow to steep for about 10 minutes, then strain out the lavender and discard. Mix the sugar into the hot lavender water, then pour into the pitcher with the ice.. Squeeze the juice from the lemons into the pitcher, getting as much juice as you can. Top off the pitcher with cold water, and stir. Taste, and adjust lemon juice or sugar if desired. Pour into tall glasses, pull up a lawn chair and a good book, and relax!

name: Mason Jar Lemonade

steps: Roll lemon on a flat surface, cut in half, and squeeze juice and pulp into mason jar. Pour 12 ounces water into the jar.. Stir sugar and remaining 2 tablespoons water together in a small saucepan over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Pour sugar mixture and ice into mason jar and stir.

name: Lavender Lemonade with Hibiscus

Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Strain lavender and hibiscus from liquid and pour into pitcher with lemon water. Refrigerate until cold.

steps: Combine 1 cup water and honey in a saucepan over medium heat; cook, stirring constantly, until well combined. Remove from heat; cool 15 to 20 minutes.. Transfer cooled honey syrup to a pitcher. Add remaining 2 1/2 cups water and lemon juice; stir to combine. Taste and adjust accordingly.

steps: Blend watermelon, water, strawberries, mango, sugar, and lemon juice in a blender until smooth, about 5 minutes.

name: Rosemary-Infused Watermelon Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'sprig', 'name': 'rosemary, leaves stripped and chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed seeded watermelon'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Bring the water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan over high heat. Stir in the rosemary, and set aside to steep for 1 hour.. Place half of the lemon juice, and half of the watermelon into a blender. Strain the rosemary syrup through a mesh strainer into the blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Strain into a pitcher, then puree the remaining lemon juice and watermelon. Stir the lemonade before serving over ice.

name: Gingerade
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles', 'name': 'ginger ale'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'granulated sugar'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'prepared lemonade'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice'}
steps: In a large punch bowl, combine the ginger ale, sugar, lemonade and ice. Stir to blend well and serve.

name: Just-Right Pineapple Lemonade from Scratch
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh squeezed lemon juice'}
steps: Combine 1 cup water and sugar in a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer over medium-high heat, stirring often. Simmer until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and allow simple syrup to cool.. Cut off pineapple crown and remove the outer skin. Cut pineapple flesh into chunks and add to a high-capacity blender (such as Vitamix). Pour in 2 cups water and blend until liquefied.. Pour liquefied pineapple juice into a pitcher. Add remaining water, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Stir before serving.

name: Blueberry Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'stevia or your choice of sweetener, to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '9', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, or more as needed'}
steps: Combine blueberries, sweetener, lemon juice, and 1 cup water together in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour into a pitcher. Add remaining water and stir. Serve chilled or over ice.

name: 28 Refreshing Lemonade Recipes to Quench Your Thirst
Strawberry-Ginger-Mint Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '18', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, stemmed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided, or more as needed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'minced fresh ginger root, or more to taste'}
steps: Place strawberries, mint, lemon juice, 1 cup water, sugar, and ginger into an electric blender and blend well.. Pour into a pitcher, add 5 cups water, and stir well. Refrigerate or serve immediately over crushed ice.

name: Strawberry Acai Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced fresh strawberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'acai powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'stevia sweetener (such as Truvia®), or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice as needed'}
steps: Combine strawberries, lemon juice, acai powder, and 1 cup water in a blender; blend until smooth.. Pour into a pitcher and add remaining 2 cups water and 1 tablespoon sweetener. Add more sweetener according to sweetness desired. Serve over ice.

name: Refreshing Summer Cucumber Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'hot water'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice from concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'cucumber, sliced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored soda'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'cucumber, sliced and then halved'}
steps: Stir hot water and sugar together in a large pitcher until sugar is dissolved. Stir in lemon juice concentrate, lemon juice, and sliced cucumbers. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until ready to serve.. Pour lemon-lime soda into pitcher. Serve lemonade over ice and garnished with lemon slices and halved cucumber slices.

name: Pineapple Lemonade Spritzers
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'lemon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(2 liter) bottle', 'name': 'carbonated water'}
steps: To make the pineapple lemon syrup: In a large saucepan over medium heat, combine pineapple juice, lemon juice, sugar and honey. Bring to a boil, and cook for 1 minute. Allow to cool, then refrigerate overnight.. Fill 6 glasses with ice. Place a slice of lemon in each glass. Pour in 2 fluid ounces pineapple lemon syrup. Fill glasses to the top with carbonated water; stir.

name: Refreshing Brazilian Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '4 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'large limes, cut into wedges and seeded'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}
steps: Combine water and limes in a blender; blend until smooth. Strain mixture through a strainer into a bowl; discard solids. Pour lime mixture into blender. Add condensed milk, ice, and sugar; blend until combined.

name: Bourbon Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'hot water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'bourbon whiskey'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice, divided, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'club soda'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon slice'}
steps: Combine hot water and brown sugar in a cocktail shaker. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add lemon juice, bourbon, triple sec, and 1 cup of ice. Cover and shake until chilled, 15 to 20 seconds.. Fill a highball glass with ice. Strain cocktail over ice and top with club soda. Stir to combine. Garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Watermelon-Raspberry Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed seedless watermelon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red raspberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}
steps: Combine 1/3 cup water and sugar in a small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves. Remove simple syrup from heat to cool.. Place watermelon, raspberries, and remaining water together in a blender; pulse until smooth. Pour watermelon mixture into a frosted pitcher; stir in simple syrup and lime juice. Refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour.

name: Creamy Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice'}
steps: Combine lemon juice, sweetened condensed milk, and 1 cup water in a blender. Blend until well combined.. Pour into a pitcher and add remaining 2 cups water. Stir.. Serve chilled and over ice.

name: Mango Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chopped mango'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'ice'}
steps: To make the simple syrup: Combine sugar and water in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a boil and stir until sugar has dissolved. Remove from heat and allow to cool.. To make the mango lemonade: Combine mango and 1 cup water in a blender or food processor until smooth. Pour mango through a strainer into a pitcher. Stir in lemon juice and simple syrup. Mix well.. Add ice to the pitcher and serve.

name: Peach Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water, divided'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'freshly squeezed lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh peaches, peeled and pitted'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'sliced peaches for garnish'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice as needed'}
steps: Place sugar in a saucepan. Pour in 1 cup water. Turn heat to medium and stir continuously until sugar granules are dissolved. Remove from heat and let cool.. Pour lemon juice into a pitcher. Pour in remaining 6 cups water.. Place pitted peaches into a Vitamix® blender. Blend until smooth. Pour peach purée into the pitcher along with the simple syrup (dissolved sugar in saucepan). Stir to combine.. Adjust to taste. Add garnish such as a slice of peach, ice, and serve.

name: When Life Gives You Lemons, Make Whole Lemon Lemonade
Quick Brazilian Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'cream of coconut'}
steps: Stir water and sugar together in a bowl until sugar dissolves; chill in refrigerator.. Cut ends off of each lime and cut each lime into 8 segments.. Working in batches, pulse sugar-water and lime wedges together in a blender several times. Pour mixture through a strainer into a pitcher.. Stir cream of coconut into lime mixture.

name: Lemonade Plus
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) cans', 'name': 'frozen lemonade concentrate'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'grapefruit, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced'}
steps: Into a gallon pitcher, empty both cans of lemonade concentrate. Place the sliced lemon, lime, grapefruit and orange in the pitcher. Stir in water until pitcher is full. Chill in refrigerator.

name: Rico's Passionate Pink Honey Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'orange'}
steps: In a saucepan, combine 1 cup water, strawberries, white sugar, brown sugar, and honey. Bring to a boil, and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool to room temperature, cover, and chill.. In a large pitcher, mix together water, lemon juice, and orange slices. Stir in cooled syrup; chill. Serve in a tall glass over ice.

name: Blueberry Stevia Lemonade
ingredients: {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh organic blueberries, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'name': 'fresh thyme'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'packets', 'name': 'Wholesome Organic Stevia, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Sparkling water to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Lemon wheel for garnish'}
steps: Muddle blueberries with lemon juice in glass.. Stir in thyme sprigs and Wholesome Organic Stevia.. Top with sparkling water to taste.. Garnish with additional blueberries and lemon wheel.

name: Spiced Lemonade Concentrate
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon stick'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced and zested'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}
steps: Combine water, sugar, cinnamon stick, cloves, and lemon zest in a saucepan; cook and stir over medium heat until just boiling, about 5 minutes.. Reduce heat to medium-low and continue to cook until reduced to a thick syrup, 10 to 15 minutes.. Stir lemon juice into the syrup; bring to a boil and cook 1 to 2 minutes more; strain into a bowl and refrigerate until chilled.
